group_1.textLeft: Instruuuctoooor.
Wanna get a snaaack?

group_1.textRight: I would, but I'm done for the day.@I've eaten enough.

group_1.textLeft: Dang. 'Cause I have noooothing to do.
Shigurin and Hagurin are off shopping in Kamihama.
Sasha left because she had stuff to take care of too.
Y'know, Shigurin seemed pretty concerned@about Miyurin, didn't she?

group_1.textRight: Shigure is a kind girl at heart…@That is to be expected.

group_1.textLeft: Hagurin's been fidgety this whooole time.
I bet she went looking for Miyurin on her way to@the store.
Sasha's been hounding me asking me@if I've seen Miyuri.
I wonder if that's what it's like to be a mama bear.
…And you're all good, Instructor?
Like, why don't you go look for Miyurin?
I heard she went home, but not a peep since then.
This cutie sent her a text, but she hasn't read it yet.

group_1.textRight: I have a duty to protect you, after all.

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's true that I'm presumed dead now.
I feel like I'm holed up in Takarazaki@so I don't get ratted out.
To be totes honest, not even everyone else@in our group knows I'm here.
Isn't it pretty unlikely that I'm suddenly gonna@get attacked by an enemy?
So don't worry about this lil cutie.@Go on ahead and start searching for her.★
If I'm ever concerned about something,@the Youth Association's here for me.
…Not that I really wanna play along with that,@but it's safer than being alone, yeah?

group_1.textRight: No, it's alright.@I'm certain that Miyu will make her way back.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm.
…Sooooo, you've been cleaning that same spot@for ages now.
Does wiping it down a bajillion times@make you feel better?
…For real? It's crazy that you're so spaced out.
I mean, this morning, you mixed up the sugar@and salt and made our breakfast mega sweet.
You're totally in the pits, huh?

group_1.textRight: I just think Miyu needs some more time.

group_1.textLeft: For what?

group_1.textRight: I'm sure she doesn't even remember
how she came to develop it to begin with, so…

group_1.textLeft: Hmm…
Well, different strokes for different folks,@as far as this cutie's concerned.★
It's hard for everyone else to "get" my relationship@with Hiko, y'know?
I feel like Miyurin's leg fetish is kind of a similar thing@in some ways, too.
Who would I be to deny Miyurin the thing she loves,@right?★
…But, like, if she's dead set on giving up@what she's into,
that's her own decision, and I'm not gonna stop her.
Those are my two cents on the subject, at least.
Besides, personally,
I think it's part of what makes Miyurin herself.★
